english.segment1: For the message. Of the cross is. Foolishness. To those who are perishing. But to us. Being saved. Its the power. Of God (I Corinthians 1:18)
english.segment2: Theres no turning back. Unless were turning back to you
english.segment3: Im not running away from this. Im not falling asleep. Im not taking a bribe from anyone for anything. Im not running away from this. Im not falling asleep. Im not turning back on the one thing that I know
english.segment4: Were the foolish. Were the weak ones. Were the lowly. And despised things that are not. God will take us. He will shape us. He will make us. Nullify the things that are (I Corinthians 1:27-28)
english.segment5: Theres no turning back. Unless were turning back to you
english.segment6: Im not running away from this. Im not falling asleep. Im not taking a bribe from anyone for anything. Im not running away from this. Im not falling asleep. Im not turning back on the one thing that I know
english.segment7: I have given up on breathing and all I need is You. I am never going down for air again
